individual_metadata.synopsis: One-line dialog from a NPC belonging to Tusgront's posse. They are secretely guarding the entrance to the Guildhall, so they are not very talkative.

0.speaker: Don't-Call-Me-Runt
0.text: Get out of our alley. Go on, before I make you.
0.context: NodeContext: Trying to sound threatening, messing it up

1.speaker: Don't-Call-Me-Runt
1.text: Mess with us and it'll be the last thing I do. I mean you'll do. Shit!
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Stressing out - he's new at thisNodeContext: Trying to sound threatening, messing it up

2.speaker: Don't-Call-Me-Runt
2.text: I'm watching you. Don't cause any trouble or - or - there'll be trouble.
2.context: NodeContext: Trying to sound threatening, gives up
